data.oai_dc:dc: This dataset contains the digitized treatments in Plazi based on the original journal article Kallies, Axel, Farino, Teresa (2018): A new species of Pharmacis Huebner, 1820 from Spain with a brief review of the genera Pharmacis and Korscheltellus Boerner, 1920 (Lepidoptera, Hepialidae). Nota Lepidopterologica 41 (2): 225-249, DOI: http://dx.doi.org/10.3897/nl.41.26835, URL: http://dx.doi.org/10.3897/nl.41.26835
